answers.answer: any swift, severe headache that doesn't go away using tylenol or lying in a dark room with a cool or warm cloth on your head should be evaluated. that combined with dizziness could definitely be a sign of something severe, OR it could be hormones...but either way I would call my doctor and ask for some advice. if the pain is truly 'severe' you may want to go to L&D...severe headaches and dizziness can be a sign of preeclampsia. I wouldn't worry too much but either call your doctor or be seen, IMO. better safe than sorry :)

also I would recommend drinking a lot of water in case it's from dehydration..have you been sleeping well recently? I get headachy and dizzy when I don't sleep well. but things that are normal when not pregnant can be serious when not pregnant so i still recommend calling your OB

I havnt taken anything for it but ive taken 2 naps today and they didnt help ive been sleeping alot because ive been very sleepy and when i went to the store today i almose fainted but my hubby lead me to a seat before i went out ive already fainted 5 times during this pregnancy

title: omg my head hurts is this normal ????
